The management reshuffle has been brought about to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said. BGC Partners analyst Colin Gillis said that Google experienced tremendous growth under Eric Schmidt , becoming a search and advertising powerhouse, although the company also arguably experienced a number of missteps and missed opportunities. A case can also be made that the company has not built any new material revenue streams, was late to building for the mobile market, has no effective social solutions, overbuilt its headcount and placed itself in the crosshairs of government regulators, Gillis said. Editor-in-chief of technology blog SearchEngineLand.com Danny Sullivan said Google's biggest challenges now are to "prove that they've got their Mojo back and that nobody needs to fear them."

What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, antiquities boss Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks try to extinguish the blaze in the NDP headquarters.
